Introduction¶

morse is a Python package to generate Morse Code tones from Python code. “Morse code is a method of transmitting text information as a series of on-off tones, lights, or clicks that can be directly understood by a skilled listener or observer without special equipment” (from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morse_Code).

It consists of the following main modules:

  • morse.code: This is the primary library for generaing tones. Using this module provides access to a writer and an audio object
  • morse.alphabet: This library lists the available alphabets which can be used to generate the output tones. Currently the only alphabet available is the “International” alphabet
